title: If you could ban an item in champion select, what would it be?
body:
Same rules as ban phase but for only 1 item

For me it's
{{item:2043}} 
(I am playing a lot as Akali)

replies.body:
{{item:1041}} 

Yeah I'm that asshole.

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TN3KYRUq,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-12-21T07:59:47.577+0000)

I'm with ya, brother.

{{item:1028}}

{{item:1036}} 

Cause why not?

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TN3KYRUq,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-12-21T07:59:47.577+0000)
>
> {{item:1041}} 
> 
> Yeah I'm that asshole.

Upvoted. It would either be that or longsword (assuming banning a component bans a finished item).

If the above isn't true then I'll ban BF sword.
{{item:3124}} Because that item is insanely strong right now, even though I some times build it on my {{champion:102}}
i do it sometimes on shy, but still i wish they remove random ap scallings on ad champs,at least those shitti ap scallings for champs that have no benefit buying a {{item:1058}}

{{item:3036}} {{item:3033}} 

Since no motherfuckers buy those 2 items, I'd save everyone the trouble and remove them from the game. Now everyone can complain tanks are OP and they'd be right for a change.
me 2

B-b-but we just got out of the tank meta...
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
http://cdn.meme.am/instances/60690995.jpg

I'd cripple any AP champions.
{{item:3089}}

{{champion:45}} : Eventually I WILL one shot you even without my precious {{item:3089}} !

{{item:3070}} {{champion:45}} {{item:3070}}
I'd basically use it like an extra ban. Nobody's going to pick Jax if they can't get a Rageblade, and banning Triforce destroys like five champs.

> [{quoted}](name=VeniVidiVelcro,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TN3KYRUq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-21T06:20:23.692+0000)
>
> I'd basically use it like an extra ban. Nobody's going to pick Jax if they can't get a Rageblade, and banning Triforce destroys like five champs.

It's not Rageblade that makes Jax strong, sure it makes him powerful, but you can use Hydra with Nashor Tooth / Wits End etc. and it will be fine.
Sometimes Frozen Gauntlet works better than Triforce, check {{champion:6}} bro

I would like to say {{item:3078}} Trinity Force for an AD based team, but it is very expensive...

Maybe {{item:3026}}  Guardian Angel or {{item:3072}}  Bloodthirster?

> [{quoted}](name=VictoryDance96,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TN3KYRUq,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-12-21T06:30:35.239+0000)
>
> I would like to say {{item:3078}} Trinity Force for an AD based team, but it is very expensive...
> 
> Maybe {{item:3026}}  Guardian Angel or {{item:3072}}  Bloodthirster?

Why do you feel the need to put both the icon and the name of the item?

#G&B, everybody!
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Courtesy?  Some of the items floating around I recognize, but most of the newer one's I have no clue, especially if I don't play the role that uses it often.

> [{quoted}](name=Leadpaintchips,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TN3KYRUq,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-12-21T13:18:47.686+0000)
>
> Courtesy?  Some of the items floating around I recognize, but most of the newer one's I have no clue, especially if I don't play the role that uses it often.

Holy shit how did you even get to level 30 without knowing the items

How about items that got introduced in the last 6 months?  I haven't played for that long, just repicked it up recently.  I've been lvl 30 for about 2 years at least, and there's been some huge changes since then.

> [{quoted}](name=Leadpaintchips,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=TN3KYRUq,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-22T23:06:52.053+0000)
>
> How about items that got introduced in the last 6 months?  I haven't played for that long, just repicked it up recently.  I've been lvl 30 for about 2 years at least, and there's been some huge changes since then.

I don't? I just hit reply without quoting.
